scripts.build-server: rm -rf server/build && parcel build server/src/server.js -t node -d server/build --no-source-maps
scripts.build-client: rm -rf client/build && parcel build client/src/index.html -d client/build --no-source-maps
scripts.build: npm run build-server && npm run build-client
scripts.watch-server: rm -rf server/dist && parcel server/src/server.js -t node -d server/dist
scripts.watch-client: rm -rf client/dist && parcel watch client/src/index.html -d client/dist
